definitions.definition: To have recourse (to) someone or something for assistance, support etc.

definitions.example: The theme of the prodigal son recurs later in the third act.

definitions.definition: A recurrence; a coming round again.
Happening or occurring frequently, with repetition.
Of a decimal: having a set of digits that is repeated indefinitely.
definitions.example: Every rational number can be written as either a terminating decimal or a recurring decimal.
